scripts.postinstall: npm run install:leveldb && npm run install:napi-macros && npm run install:snappy && npm run install:evmone && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:leveldown && npm run test:leveldown:gc
scripts.install:leveldb: test -d leveldb || (git clone https://github.com/REI-Network/leveldb && cd leveldb && git reset --hard 1162b57)
scripts.install:napi-macros: test -d napi-macros || (git clone https://github.com/hyperdivision/napi-macros && cd napi-macros && git reset --hard 6447512)
scripts.install:snappy: test -d snappy || (git clone https://github.com/google/snappy && cd snappy && git reset --hard 2b63814)
scripts.install:evmone: test -d evmone || (git clone https://github.com/ethereum/evmone && cd evmone && git reset --hard e95cdf7 && git submodule update --init --recursive)
